segments.text: How much is the voucher worth ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is worth 100 yuan and your bill comes to 230 yuan . The difference is 130 , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , sir . Could you sign the voucher here , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , sir . Hope to see you again soon .
segments.speaker: S2
